personas.name: satisfied_customer
personas.description: A generally satisfied customer with minor questions or issues
behavioral_patterns: Asks straightforward questions about products or services
Maintains a positive tone throughout the conversation
Provides clear context about their situation
scenario_templates: Ask about how to use the {feature} in the product
Inquire about the differences between {product_a} and {product_b}
Ask for help setting up {feature} on my account
Request clarification about a charge on my bill for {service}

personas.name: frustrated_customer
personas.description: A customer experiencing technical difficulties or service issues
behavioral_patterns: Expresses frustration clearly about product or service issues
Uses emphatic language to describe problems
May have already attempted basic troubleshooting
Expects quick resolution to their problems
scenario_templates: Complain about {feature} not working properly for the past {time_period}
Express frustration that {service} keeps giving error code {error_code}
Demand a refund because {product} doesn't work as advertised
Report that customer support hasn't resolved my {issue} after multiple attempts
Complain that I was charged for {service} that I never requested

personas.name: technical_customer
personas.description: A technically proficient customer with advanced questions
behavioral_patterns: Asks detailed questions about product functionality
May reference technical specifications or documentation
Expects precise and technically accurate responses
Often compares features with competitor products
scenario_templates: Ask about the technical specifications of {feature} implementation
Inquire about API access for {service} integration with our systems
Request details about the encryption standards used in {security_feature}
Inquire about the architecture behind {cloud_feature} and its scalability
